thread.title: Rick Steves: Hungary’s capital an elegant paradox
thread.title_full: Rick Steves: Hungary’s capital an elegant paradox - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rick Steves
title: Rick Steves: Hungary’s capital an elegant paradox
text: Most Americans choose Prague as their first foray into Eastern Europe, but the true powerhouse of the region is Budapest, capital of Hungary. Budapest can be challenging and complicated, but it’s a cosmopolitan place of unexpected elegance, fascinating and rewarding.
